Sequence Information.Peptide Name: GLRC-5 (Synthetic AMPs, variant of GLR-19, Arg-rich; Leu-rich; 1S=S, UCSS1a)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is poorly similar (84.21%) toGLRC-2. R: 38%; L: 31%.Chemical modification:  one disulfide bond C4-C16.Activity: inhibited HSV-2MS in Vero cells (EC50 7.72 ug/ml); E. coli (MIC 30 uM); B. subtilis (MIC 60 uM).Toxicity: TC50 41.9 ug/ml in CEM-SS cells. UPdated 6/2024
Literature Information.Author: Wang G, Watson KM, Mishra B, Lushnikova T, Buckheit RW Jr. 2011
Literature Information.Reference: J AIDS Clinic Res S2:003. doi:10.4172/2155-6113.S2-003.Wang HIV screen project
Literature Information.Title:
De Novo Design of Antiviral and Antibacterial Peptides with 
Varying Loop Structures
